intro: Elatostema manhaoense, commonly known as the Manhao stellaria, is a species of flowering plant in the family Urticaceae. It is native to China, specifically found in the Yunnan province. The plant is a low-growing herb with small, heart-shaped leaves that are often covered in fine hairs. Its flowers are small and greenish-white, arranged in clusters, and it produces small, round fruits. Elatostema manhaoense is adapted to moist, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories.
